high_descs: Turn around, go straight to the desk.
Take the CD from the desk.
Turn right, go to the end of the desk before the bed, turn left towards the desk.
Turn on the lamp on the desk.
anns.task_desc: Inspect a CD by a lit lamp.

high_descs: Turn around and walk across the room to the desk.
Pick up the CD on the desk.
Walk to the right and then turn left to face the desk.
Turn on the lamp on the right corner of the desk.
anns.task_desc: To see the CD in the light.

high_descs: Turn around and walk to the wooden desk.
Grab the CD that is on top of the wooden desk.
Turn right, walk to the bed, and then turn left to face the desk.
Turn on the lamp on the wooden desk.
anns.task_desc: Look at the CD under the light on the desk.
